name: Miss Me Not

ingredients.item: Celery and sugar snap pea syrup*

preparation:
Combine Don Julio Blanco Tequila, sherry, fresh lemon juice, celery and sugar snap pea syrup into a shaker with ice. Shake well.
Strain contents into a highball glass over ice and top with seltzer. Garnish with mint sprig and absinthe mist.
